column1: Funeral Services will be held at 11:00 am
column5: at St. Rita Catholic Church in Catahoula
column10: 2015. The family requests that visiting hours be observed at Dion Hall in Catahoula from 10:00 am until 10:00 pm on Monday
column11: and continue on Tuesday at 7:00 am until 10:30 am. A rosary will be prayed at 7:00 pm on Monday. Rev. Richard Fabre will officiate at the Funeral Service. Interment will follow at Our Lady of the Lake Cemetery in Catahoula.
